/*
+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
title     Northem Dark Atom UI - UI Variables +
project   northem-dark-atom-ui                +
file      ui-variables.less                   +
version   0.4.0                               +
author    Arctic Ice Studio                   +
email     development@arcticicestudio.com     +
website   http://arcticicestudio.com          +
copyright Copyright (C) 2015-2016             +
created   2015-04-02 13:13 UTC+0200           +
modified  2016-02-06 22:26 UTC+0100           +
+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

[Description]
This file maps all official and hardcoded UI variables to the custom definded
  - color variables of the "colors.less" file
  - size variables of the "sizes.less" file
and sets the global font font families.

[Index]
  (1) Imports
  (2) Color
    (2.0) Background
    (2.1) Base
    (2.2) Button
    (2.3) Input
    (2.4) Information Level
    (2.5) Overlay
    (2.6) Pane
    (2.7) Panel
    (2.8) Site
    (2.9) Tab
    (2.10) Text
    (2.11) Treeview
  (3) Size
    (3.0) Component
    (3.1) Tab
    (3.2) Text
  (4) Font

[Copyright]
Copyright (C) 2015-2016 Arctic Ice Studio <development@arcticicestudio.com>

[License]
Northem code is licensed under "GPL3" (http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl.txt).
Northem color palette itself is licensed under "CC BY-NC-SA 4.0" (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0).

This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify
it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by
the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or
(at your option) any later version.

This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  See the
GNU General Public License for more details.

You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License
along with this program.  If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.

[References]
Northem Dark
  (https://github.com/arcticicestudio/northem-dark)
Atom API-Documentation
  (https://atom.io/docs/api/latest/Atom)
Atom Flight Manual
  (https://atom.io/docs)
LESSCSS
  (http://lesscss.org)
Modular Scale
  (http://www.modularscale.com)
*/
/* +----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
   + Imports                                                                [1] +
   +----------------------------------------------------------------------------+ */
/*
#************************************************#
#                  Northem Dark                  #
#------------------------------------------------#
#                  northem-dark                  #
#                  version 1.0.0                 #
#       http://arcticicestudio.com/Northem       #
#                                                #
#                Arctic Ice Studio               #
#               Copyright (c) 2015               #
#         development@arcticicestudio.com        #
#                                                #
#      Created : 2015-03-13 19:24 +0100 UTC      #
#      Modified: 2015-05-23 20:14 +0100 UTC      #
#************************************************#

[Description]
Northem is a north-bluish dark color palette designed by Arctic Ice Studio.
Optimized for syntax highlighting and UI projects.
This is a darker and more blue-tinged variation.

[Variations]
Also available as:
  "Northem"          (https://github.com/arcticicestudio/northem)
  "Northem Light"    (in drafting)

[Projects]
Based on this the following projects are available:

  Syntax
    - "Northem Dark Atom Syntax"      (https://github.com/arcticicestudio/northem-dark-atom-syntax)
    - "Northem Dark Eclipse Syntax"   (https://github.com/arcticicestudio/northem-dark-eclipse-syntax)
    - "Northem Dark gedit"            (https://github.com/arcticicestudio/northem-dark-gedit)
    - "Northem Dark Notepad++"        (https://github.com/arcticicestudio/northem-dark-notepadplusplus)

  UI
    - "Northem Dark Atom UI"     (https://github.com/arcticicestudio/northem-dark-atom-ui)
    - "Northem Dark GTK"         (in drafting)

Visit http://arcticicestudio.com/Northem (actually under construction) for more informations.

[File Formats]
Northem Dark is available in many file formats:
  Non-Native
    - LESS        .less
    - SASS        .scss
    - JSON        .json
    - XML         .xml
    - Markdown    .md
    - Java        .java
  *Native*
    - GIMP/Inkscape Palette       .gcl
    - Adobe Swatch Exchange       .ase
    - Alias/WaveFront Material    .mtl
    - Gpick Palette               .gpa

[Version]
LATEST:
  - stable:     1.0.0 (https://github.com/arcticicestudio/northem-dark/releases/tag/1.0.0)
  - snapshot:   /

state: indev

For variations or older versions check out the GitHub Repository (https://github.com/arcticicestudio/northem-dark) and http://arcticicestudio.com/Northem (actually under construction).

[Changelog]
Check out the "CHANGELOG.md" or visit the GitHub Repository (https://github.com/arcticicestudio/northem-dark) and http://arcticicestudio.com/Northem (actually under construction).

[Development]
Please report bugs and suggestions for improvements at TODO.

[Recommendations]
Recommended fonts are:
  Syntax
    "Source Code Pro" (https://typekit.com/fonts/source-code-pro) (GitHub Repository: https://github.com/adobe-fonts/source-code-pro)
  UI
    "Roboto" (http://www.google.com/fonts/specimen/Roboto) (GitHub Repository: https://github.com/google/fonts/tree/master/apache/roboto)

[License]
Copyright (C) 2015 Arctic Ice Studio

Northem code is licensed under "GPL3" (http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl.txt).
Northem color palette itself is licensed under "CC BY-NC-SA 4.0" (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0).

[References]
LESS:   http://lesscss.org
X11:    /usr/share/X11/rgb.txt
*/

.settings-view .package-card {
  padding: 2.25em;
  margin-bottom: 1.5em;
  list-style-type: none;
  font-size: 1.2em;
  border-radius: 4px;
  border: 1px solid #242429;
  background-color: #323239;
  overflow: hidden;
  cursor: pointer;
  -webkit-user-select: none;
}
.settings-view .package-card:hover {
  background-color: #37373e;
}
.settings-view .package-card:active {
  background-color: #323239;
}
.settings-view .package-card.disabled {
  background-color: #2b2b31;
}
.settings-view .package-card.disabled .body,
.settings-view .package-card.disabled .avatar,
.settings-view .package-card.disabled .author,
.settings-view .package-card.disabled .stats {
  opacity: .5;
}
.settings-view .package-card.deprecated {
  background-color: #2b2b31;
}
.settings-view .package-card.deprecated .avatar,
.settings-view .package-card.deprecated .author,
.settings-view .package-card.deprecated .stats {
  opacity: .5;
}
.settings-view .package-card .deprecation-badge {
  display: none;
  font-size: .75em;
  text-transform: uppercase;
}
.settings-view .package-card.deprecated .deprecation-badge {
  display: inline;
}
.settings-view .package-card.col-lg-4 {
  min-width: 190px;
  padding: 1.5em 0;
  padding-left: 1.5em;
  padding-right: 1.5em;
}
.settings-view .package-card .thumbnail {
  border-radius: 3px;
  margin: 0;
  min-height: 140px;
  color: #dedede;
  border-radius: 4px;
  border: 1px solid #242429;
  background-color: #323239;
}
.settings-view .package-card .thumbnail .caption {
  width: 100%;
  position: relative;
}
.settings-view .package-card .package-name {
  text-overflow: ellipsis;
  white-space: nowrap;
  width: 100%;
  color: #ebebeb;
  overflow: hidden;
  line-height: 20px;
  margin: 5px 0;
}
.settings-view .package-card .description {
  color: #dedede;
  overflow: hidden;
  min-height: 38px;
  max-height: 38px;
  text-overflow: ellipsis;
  display: -webkit-box;
  -webkit-line-clamp: 2;
  /* number of lines to show */
  -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
}
.settings-view .package-card .package-message p:last-child {
  margin: 0;
}
.settings-view .package-card .downloads {
  color: #ebebeb;
  overflow: hidden;
  text-overflow: ellipsis;
  display: -webkit-box;
  -webkit-line-clamp: 1;
  /* number of lines to show */
  -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
}
.settings-view .package-card .package-status {
  right: 0px;
  top: 5px;
  text-align: center;
}
.settings-view .package-card .package-status.icon-cloud-download {
  color: #428bca;
}
.settings-view .package-card .package-status.icon-check {
  color: #6CC644;
}
.settings-view .package-card .package-status.icon-alert {
  color: #BD2C00;
}
.settings-view .package-card .card-name {
  font-weight: 300;
  margin: 0 0 .2em 0;
  font-size: 1.2em;
  line-height: 1.4;
}
.settings-view .package-card .card-name .css-truncate-target {
  color: $greenDark;
}
.settings-view .package-card .stats .stats-item {
  margin-left: 2.25em;
  height: 26px;
  display: inline-block;
  line-height: 24px;
  vertical-align: top;
}
.settings-view .package-card .stats .stats-item .icon {
  color: rgba(222, 222, 222, 0.6);
}
.settings-view .package-card .stats .star-box {
  display: inline-block;
  vertical-align: top;
}
.settings-view .package-card .stats .star-box .star-button {
  padding: 0 6px;
}
.settings-view .package-card .stats .star-box .star-button .octicon {
  margin-right: 0px;
}
.settings-view .package-card .body .css-truncate-target {
  max-width: 100%;
}
.settings-view .package-card .package-description {
  white-space: normal;
  line-height: 1.4;
}
.settings-view .package-card .meta {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  justify-content: flex-end;
  width: 100%;
}
.settings-view .package-card .meta a.linked-octicon {
  text-decoration: none;
}
.settings-view .package-card .meta a.linked-octicon:hover .octicon {
  color: $greenDark;
}
.settings-view .package-card .meta a.linked-octicon:hover .value {
  color: $greenDark;
}
.settings-view .package-card .meta .action {
  border-radius: 3px;
  padding: 3px 6px;
}
.settings-view .package-card .meta .action:hover {
  background-color: #eaeaea;
}
.settings-view .package-card .meta .value {
  color: #999;
}
.settings-view .package-card .meta-user {
  flex: 1 0 auto;
  margin-top: 1.5em;
  margin-right: 1.5em;
}
.settings-view .package-card .meta-user .avatar {
  border-radius: 2px;
  height: 24px;
  width: 24px;
  display: inline-block;
  vertical-align: middle;
  background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
}
.settings-view .package-card .meta-user .author {
  color: rgba(222, 222, 222, 0.6);
  margin-left: 1.5em;
}
.settings-view .package-card .meta-user .author:focus {
  outline: none;
}
.settings-view .package-card .meta-controls {
  margin-top: 0.75em;
}
.settings-view .package-card .meta-controls .install-button.is-installing,
.settings-view .package-card .meta-controls .uninstall-button.is-uninstalling {
  opacity: 1;
  background-image: linear-gradient(to right, transparent 50%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15) 50%);
  background-size: 10px 100%;
  -webkit-animation: available-package-is-installing 0.5s linear infinite;
}
.settings-view .package-card .meta-controls .status-indicator {
  padding: 0;
  width: 0.75em;
  min-width: 4px;
  pointer-events: none;
  transition: background .4s;
  background: #ced272;
}
.settings-view .package-card .meta-controls .status-indicator.is-disabled {
  background: #ffce82;
}
.settings-view .package-card .meta-controls .btn-toolbar > .btn-group {
  float: left;
  margin: 0.75em 0 0 0.75em;
}
.settings-view .package-card .meta-lower {
  padding: 13px;
  background-color: #131315;
  line-height: 1;
}
.settings-view .package-card.blank-slate {
  text-align: center;
  color: $beigeDark;
  height: 132px;
  line-height: 132px;
}
.settings-view .package-detail .package-card {
  cursor: default;
}
.settings-view .package-detail .package-card:hover {
  background-color: #323239;
}
.settings-view .package-detail .package-card.disabled {
  background-color: #2b2b31;
}
@-webkit-keyframes available-package-is-installing {
  100% {
    background-position: -10px 0px;
  }
}
